a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball VI

p.k: The One / The Vegging / The Father / The Neighbor / The Cringe / The Anybody / The Pact / The Candidate Gumball is surprised by how upset he is when Tobias makes fun of him, tries to figure out why he feels Tobias doesn't have the right. / Gumball and Darwin have decided to do nothing for a whole day, but sometimes it's much harder to do nothing than something. / The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / The kids realise that they've never known their neighbour's name, and they're way past the window where they can ask. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesn't know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates.
